00121 /***********************************************************************
00122 *
00123 *  LSM2D_COMPUTE_MEAN_CURVATURE_SGN_DIST() computes
00124 *  kappa = (laplacian phi) / ( 1 - phi * laplacian phi)
00125 *
00126 *  For a signed distance function  phi, kappa equals mean curvature 
00127 *  on phi = 0 and is constant in direction normal to the zero level set.
00128 *  See Zhao/Chan/Merriman/Osher 1996.
00129 *
00130 *  Arguments:
00131 *    kappa (in/out):    curvature array
00132 *    phi  (in):         level set function (assumed signed distance func)
00133 *    *_gb (in):         index range for ghostbox
00134 *    *_fb (in):         index range for fillbox
00135 *  
00136 *  Notes: 
00137 *   - Be careful in regions where denominator above is zero, computed value
00138 *     will default to the value of Laplacian
00139 */  
00140 void  LSM2D_COMPUTE_MEAN_CURVATURE_SGN_DIST(
00141   LSMLIB_REAL *kappa,
00142   const int *ilo_kappa_gb, 
00143   const int *ihi_kappa_gb,
00144   const int *jlo_kappa_gb, 
00145   const int *jhi_kappa_gb,
00146   const LSMLIB_REAL *phi,
00147   const int *ilo_phi_gb, 
00148   const int *ihi_phi_gb,
00149   const int *jlo_phi_gb, 
00150   const int *jhi_phi_gb,
00151   const int *ilo_fb, 
00152   const int *ihi_fb,
00153   const int *jlo_fb,  
00154   const int *jhi_fb,
00155   const LSMLIB_REAL *dx,
00156   const LSMLIB_REAL *dy);  
00157
